original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>成功行 釜底抽薪 之計，降低該據點各項發展度，影響錢糧生產！(<color=#bceea7>釜底抽薪 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent people to successfully draw salaries from the bottom of <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> to reduce the development of the base and affect the production of money and food! (<color=#bceea7>Successful drawing of salary from the bottom</color>)
